trends: There have been 2 other sightings in tipton
There were no other sightings in tipton on or around September 27th 2008
Summary: 2 nd time rotating circular shape with blinking lights
divs: Sighting DetailsOK,this the 2nd time we have seen this (in the last month)in the western sky. A circular shape which seems to spin from a ful cirlce then it looks elongated. when it is the full circle shape it resembles a ferris wheel wth all of the lights blinking. These lights seems to be white, red & blue. It stays in the sae locatio for up to 2 hours then fades...Could this e a statelite??
